--관리자 테이블
SELECT *
FROM MANAGER_REGISTER;
/*
M0001	1234567	2022-03-20
M0002	8910	2022-03-20
*/

--교수 테이블
SELECT *
FROM TEACHER_REGISTER;
/*
T0001	1234	김교수	9909091234567	2022-03-20
T0002	2345678	박교수	6501012345678	2022-03-20
*/

--학생 테이블
SELECT *
FROM STUDENT_REGISTER;
/*
S0001	1234	김공일	9203271234567	2022-03-20
S0002	1234	김공이	9505012234567	2022-03-20
S0003	1234	김공삼	9705031234567	2022-03-20
S0004	1234	김공사	9908012234567	2022-03-20
S0005	1234	김공오	9102031234567	2022-03-20
S0006	1234	김공육	9808182234567	2022-03-20
S0007	1234	김공칠	9909091234567	2022-03-20
S0008	1234	김공팔	9403042234567	2022-03-20
S0009	1234	김공구	9202011234567	2022-03-20
S0010	1234	김공십	9712242234567	2022-03-20
*/

--과정개설테이블
SELECT *
FROM COURSE_OPEN;
/*
C1	1		101	2021-07-01	2021-12-31	2022-03-20
C2	1		201	2021-09-01	2022-03-01	2022-03-20
C3	1		301	2022-01-01	2022-06-30	2022-03-20
*/

--과정테이블
SELECT *
FROM COURSE;
--1	자바만함

--강의실테이블
SELECT *
FROM CLASSROOM_REGISTER;
/*
101	101호	10
201	201호	20
301	301호	30
*/

--과목개설테이블
OSC1	1	1	C1	2021-07-01	2021-08-31	30	40	30	2022-03-20
OSC2	2	2	C1	2021-09-01	2021-10-31	20	30	50	2022-03-20
OSC3	3	3	C1	2021-11-01	2021-12-30	70	10	20	2022-03-20
OSC4	1	1	C2	2021-09-01	2021-09-30	30	40	30	2022-03-20
OSC5	2	2	C2	2021-10-01	2021-11-30	20	30	50	2022-03-20
OSC6	3	3	C2	2021-12-01	2022-02-28	70	10	20	2022-03-20
OSC7	1	1	C3	2022-01-01	2022-02-28	30	40	30	2022-03-20
OSC8	2	2	C3	2022-03-01	2022-04-30	20	30	50	2022-03-20
OSC9	3	3	C3	2022-05-01	2022-06-30	70	10	20	2022-03-20

-- 성적입력테이블
/*
OSC1_1	OSC1	CRC11	70	60	50	2022-03-20
OSC1_2	OSC1	CRC12	20	80	50	2022-03-20
OSC1_3	OSC1	CRC13	90	80	90	2022-03-20
OSC2_1	OSC2	CRC11	20	50	50	2022-03-20
OSC2_2	OSC2	CRC12	50	80	50	2022-03-20
OSC2_3	OSC2	CRC13	60	80	90	2022-03-20
OSC3_1	OSC3	CRC11	70	40	50	2022-03-20
OSC3_2	OSC3	CRC12	20	20	50	2022-03-20
OSC3_3	OSC3	CRC13	90	30	90	2022-03-20
OSC4_1	OSC4	CRC21	70	60	50	2022-03-20
OSC4_2	OSC4	CRC22	20	80	50	2022-03-20
OSC4_3	OSC4	CRC23	90	80	90	2022-03-20
OSC5_1	OSC5	CRC21	20	50	50	2022-03-20
OSC5_2	OSC5	CRC22	50	80	50	2022-03-20
OSC5_3	OSC5	CRC23	60	80	90	2022-03-20
OSC6_1	OSC6	CRC21	70	40	50	2022-03-20
OSC6_2	OSC6	CRC22	20	20	50	2022-03-20
OSC6_3	OSC6	CRC23	90	30	90	2022-03-20
OSC7_1	OSC7	CRC31	70	60	50	2022-03-20
OSC7_2	OSC7	CRC32	20	80	50	2022-03-20
OSC7_3	OSC7	CRC33	90	80	90	2022-03-20
*/

--과목테이블
/*
1	자바초급
2	자바중급
3	자바고급
*/

--교재테이블
/*
1	자바첫걸음	
2	자바뛴다	
3	자바난다요	
*/
